Then with all your skills and tools at your side, Roll & Write your way through each scenario campaign’s branching narrative, culminating in one of various endings!

Into the Outside: Prelude contains one storybook scenario. This scenario comprises a 3 game campaign and variant for playing.

—description from the designer

Name: Flotter Dreier
Description: In Flotter Dreier, each round you flip a red and a blue card, which determines the category. The goal for each player is, to provide three answers for this category. Ideally those answers are the most mentioned answers from the other players. The more identical answers, the more points for all the players involved. But beware, you don't want all of the players to give the same answer, since then, no one will score.

Name: That's it!: Which do you like?
Description:
Everyone likes different things, sees things differently.
Can you pick a theme, then split everyone evenly?
Get them to choose exactly 50/50 to score points!
Let’s find out what they really like!
You can play at Online, and you can play with the listeners with the Streaming site.

Each player has one Voting card.
You can see A and B at face-up.

The turn player reads the top of the Topic card.
For example, the Italian food.

The turn player makes two selection.
A: Arrabbiata
B: Seafood pizza

Each player included in the turn player votes A or B secretly, and open all at once. *You cannot take a lie.

If 50/50, the turn player takes the Topic card as a score point.

At the end of the game, the winner is the player with the highest points.

You will know the secret liking of the players.

—description from the designer

Name: That's it!: Deep – Which do you like?
Description:
Everyone likes different things, sees things differently.
Can you pick a theme, then split everyone evenly?
Get them to choose exactly 50/50 to score points!
Let’s find out what they really like!

You can play online, or with listeners on the streaming site.

This game is only for Japanese OTAKU. Because of many Japanese idioms and similar in the game, this edition will not be translated into English, and is only available in Japanese.

Each player has one Voting card, with an A on one side, and B on the other.

The lead player reads the top of the topic card for example, Animation. They then make two selections, for example A: Dragon Ball or B: One Piece.

Each player included in the round then votes A or B secretly, and all votes are revealed at once. Players may not lie about their selections.

If the votes are 50/50, the lead player takes the topic card and scores a point.

At the end of the game, the winner is the player with the most points.

You will all learn what the secret likings of the players are!

Name: Dice99
Description:
Let's learn multiplication tables! Let's learn multiplication tables!

'Dice99' is a functional educational board game that you can learn easily and enjoyably by multiplying the combinations of cards you have.

There are two conditions to remember when creating a multiplication table.

The first is to create the result of multiplying the numbers in the dodecahedron.
Second, you need to generate the resulting value with 2 cards of different colors.

Shout the multiplication table faster than anyone else, and who is the multiplication champion?

<Purpose of the game>
1. You should collect the most chips.

<Game ready>
1. The player deals 5 cards. The remaining cards are stacked face down and placed in the center of the table.
2. Place chips and dodecahedron dice next to the deck of cards.
3. Take one multiplication table and refer to it during the game.

<Game play>
1. The youngest rolls the dice.
(After that, the person who got the house by matching the correct answer rolls the dice.)
2. Check the dice, make the multiplication table result with 2 color cards and place it on the pile where the multiplication table shouts out loud.
3. If the dice side is â˜…, make the desired multiplication phrase result, shout the multiplication phrase aloud, and play 2 cards of different colors.
4. If the die is 3579, make an odd number using two cards of different colors.
5. If the dice is 2468, two cards of different colors are used to make an even number.
6. The player with the first result gets 1 chip. If several people produce results at the same time, the one who gets the most takes the chips. 
(You can return 1 chip, discard as many cards as you like, and draw them from the pile.)
7. The player with the chip replenishes 2 cards from the pile and then rolls the dice.

<Game ends>
1. When all the chips are gone, the game is over, and the player with the most chips wins.

Name: Santa Kids
Description:
The long awaited Christmas. Santa's kids are up for it again this year!
Take the presents on a sled at the factory and deliver them to cities around the world.
Many happenings are waiting for you on the way.
Who will collect the most bells, a sign of gratitude, before the morning arrives?

To Win:
Whoever collects the most bells at the end of the night wins.

How to play:
The rules of Santa Kids are very simple.
There are only four actions to choose from.
They are easy to understand: Grab a present, Move, Distribute a present, and Get a reindeer or sled.
Play as many of these actions as you have reindeer, and your turn is up.
Give out presents of the same color as the socks in each city, and collect as many bells as you can!
Fun events occur while you're playing! It's snowing and a nice wind. All sorts of happenings, like being called by Papa Santa and secret loopholes, make the game so much more exciting!

—description from the publisher

Name: Pota Star
Description:
Potato Country has a lot of nice and unique potatoes, but they all dream of becoming the best star Potato.

Known to rise and fall in value with the weather, potatoes can grow into the best star potatoes by carefully managing them as the weather changes throughout the week.

Could your potato be the best star?

<Purpose of the game>
1. Out of the 7 character potatoes, the player who gets the most points by devising a strategy to reach the highest score for the potato he supports wins.

<Game play>
1. Place each potato character in position 0 on the board.
2. All players take 7 Weather Cards per color.
3. Shuffle the'Porta Star' candidate registration card and divide it into two. At this time, the character card taken once cannot be replac
4. Check the character card and turn it over.
5. Declare one, two, three and place the weather card face down.
6. Play the cards laid out in order of play.
7. Move the character according to the weather indicated on the card. At this time, you need to move the number of cards and the number of moving spaces at once.
8. When all players finish applying the effect according to the card, turn clockwise to play the game.

<Game ends>
1. The game ends when all weather cards are used. Reveal the character card and calculate the score. If there are 2 same characters, the score is doubled. However, if there are 2 in the minus, it is minus 2 times. The player with the highest score wins by adding up the scores of each character he has.

Name: BEASTORY
Description:
Be a story.
BEASTORY.

Your are a party of beasts who much travel deep into the Emerald Forest to defeat the unknown.  Can you survive?  If you risk too much by going too far into the forest you can lose your life.  Search for items and upgrade your skills along the way.

This is a cooperative RPG style board game, where players play beast character like a monkey who wields a short sword, a bear with an axe.

In the game there is a :
Preparation phase
Event phase
- In the Event phase there will be either an: Action phase & Chance phase
OR a Battle phase 
Standby phase
Boss phase which occurs on your 5th day in the forest

Name: Monsters on Board: Monster Mixer
Description:
Enough planning - it's time for the Blue Moon Monster Mixer! Extend the life of the party with three distinct modules that offer new ways to play and earn Spook Juice. The Monster Mixer also contains a few other small modules that can be mixed-and-matched as you please.

With this expansion, it's good to mix things up. Try hosting a dinner party and catering to the demands of your guests. Or maybe enter in a body-building contest as you assemble your very own abomination. You could even uncover clues to prevent a murder and catch a would-be criminal before time runs out!

—description from the publisher

Name: ROBOTECH: Crisis Point Game – Danger Zone Promo Expansion
Description:
A booster pack that adds 6 new expansion cards to the Robotech: Crisis Point game. The cards included are:

Army of the Southern Cross
-new Unit card: VHT-2 Myrmidon
-new Hero card: Bowie Grant
- new Command card: Supporting Fire

The Masters
-new Unit card: Imperial Bioroid
-new Hero card: Clone Masters
-new Command card: Spring the Trap

Name: Goblin Teeth: Promo Pack
Description:
Includes five new cards for the base game:

- Dentist
- Speedy
- The Oracle
- Unique
- Up To Eleven

Also has a cover card and instructions card, included in the sealed plastic sleeve.

Name: Cindr: Saxophone Serenader Promo Card
Description:
A single promotional card for Cindr from the Game Boy Geek 2020 Kickstarter funding campaign.

Five stars.

Meet up: Elvish Ales
Next step: Serenades
Next level: Enchanted Evening

Upgrade any die by one here.

Bonus: Roll a spark on your last roll of a successful date, and add 1 Love point to your total.
